participant_1.background:
I spend most of my time alone, reading, writing, and listening to music.
I start my day with a quick cup of coffee and read the news while I feed my dog.
I grew up going to the beach with my family.
i believe the rich shouldn t be taxed as much.
i married my high school sweetheart.

participant_2.background:
I try to eat healthy foods and exercise regularly because I want to get in better shape for my girlfriend and the baby.
i have a daughter.
i love the game halo.
I am a software engineer, and I am trying to figure out how to cope with my recent breakup.
I love growing plants in my greenhouse, but I have to be careful about what I grow because of my asthma.

content.text: Hello there, how is it going?
It is going well, thanks for asking.  What about you?
It is going well too.  I just got back from the beach with my family.
Nice!  What are some of your favorite things to do at the beach?
I love to swim, play in the sand, and eat ice cream.  How about you?
I like to do those things too!  I also love to build sandcastles.
I love building sandcastles too!  I am not very good at them, but I have fun trying.
Me neither!  But it is still fun to try.
What are some other things you like to do?
I like to play video games, read, and watch movies.
I like to do all of those things too!  I also like to write and listen to music.
Me too!  I love music.  What are some of your favorite bands?
I like a lot of different kinds of music, but I really like the band Radiohead.
I have heard of them, but I have never listened to their music.
You should!  They are really good.  What are some of your favorite movies?
I like a lot of different types of movies, but I really like the Lord of the Rings trilogy.
I love the Lord of the Rings movies too!  They are so good.
They are!  I have seen them all so many times.
Me too!  They are my favorite movies.
I am glad we have so much in common.  I think we would be good friends.
I think so too!  It was nice talking to you.
